filmography.title: Teddy at the Throttle
filmography.role_description: A resourceful young woman who is chained to a railroad track by a villain in this iconic Keystone comedy short.
filmography.plot: A villain chains a young woman to a railroad track to secure her inheritance, requiring her dog and boyfriend to save her.

filmography.title: Don't Change Your Husband
filmography.role_description: A bored wife who divorces her dull husband for a dashing playboy, only to discover that excitement isn't everything.
filmography.plot: A woman divorces her husband because he is too boring, only to find her new husband's exciting lifestyle exhausting.

filmography.title: For Better, for Worse
filmography.role_description: A woman who marries a pacifist doctor, but her love is tested when her former suitor returns as a war hero.
filmography.plot: A woman marries a man she believes is a coward for not enlisting, only to learn he is performing facial reconstruction for wounded soldiers.

filmography.title: Male and Female
filmography.role_description: A haughty British aristocrat who becomes dependent on her resourceful butler when they are shipwrecked on a desert island.
filmography.plot: An aristocratic family is shipwrecked on an island, where the social hierarchy is reversed as their butler becomes the leader.

filmography.title: Why Change Your Wife?
filmography.role_description: A frumpy housewife who transforms herself into a glamorous, modern woman to win back her husband after he leaves her.
filmography.plot: A husband leaves his prudish wife for a more exciting woman, prompting the wife to undergo a stunning transformation.

filmography.title: The Affairs of Anatol
filmography.role_description: The patient wife of a restless socialite who constantly seeks to 'rescue' other women, only to find trouble.
filmography.plot: A wealthy socialite spends his time trying to improve the lives of various women, much to the annoyance of his wife.

filmography.title: Beyond the Rocks
filmography.role_description: A young woman forced to marry an older millionaire to save her father's fortune, while falling in love with a handsome nobleman.
filmography.plot: A young woman marries a wealthy older man for her father's sake but falls for a dashing nobleman on her honeymoon.

filmography.title: Zaza
filmography.role_description: A fiery French music hall star who falls deeply in love with a diplomat, unaware that he is already married.
filmography.plot: A music hall actress falls for a diplomat, only to discover he has a wife and child, leading to a heartbreaking confrontation.

filmography.title: Bluebeard's 8th Wife
filmography.role_description: The daughter of an impoverished aristocrat who marries a wealthy American with a history of divorce, determined to teach him a lesson.
filmography.plot: A woman marries a wealthy man known for his many divorces and decides to tame him by making him jealous.

filmography.title: The Humming Bird
filmography.role_description: A Parisian pickpocket who disguises herself as a boy to evade the police and later becomes a war hero.
filmography.plot: A Parisian criminal known as 'The Humming Bird' organizes her gang to fight for France during World War I.

filmography.title: Manhandled
filmography.role_description: A department store clerk who is used by her boyfriend's boss to impersonate a Russian countess.
filmography.plot: A shopgirl climbs the social ladder in New York City, dealing with various suitors and the jazz age lifestyle.

filmography.title: Madame Sans-Gêne
filmography.role_description: A feisty washerwoman who rises to become the Duchess of Danzig during the Napoleonic era.
filmography.plot: A laundress who washes clothes for Napoleon becomes a Duchess but refuses to learn court etiquette, causing scandal.
filmography.awards: First American film made in France

filmography.title: Stage Struck
filmography.role_description: A waitress who dreams of becoming a stage actress to impress a pancake flipper she loves.
filmography.plot: A waitress dreams of acting fame and tries to win the heart of a co-worker who is obsessed with actresses.

filmography.title: The Untamed Lady
filmography.role_description: A headstrong society woman with a terrible temper who must learn humility to find love.
filmography.plot: A wild society woman refuses to be tamed by any man until she meets one who refuses to put up with her tantrums.

filmography.title: Fine Manners
filmography.role_description: A chorus girl who tries to learn high-society manners to please her wealthy boyfriend.
filmography.plot: A burlesque dancer falls for a rich man who tries to refine her, but she decides she prefers her own world.

filmography.title: The Love of Sunya
filmography.role_description: A woman given the mystical ability to see her future with three different suitors.
filmography.plot: A woman is shown her possible futures with three different men by a mystic yogi, helping her choose her path.

filmography.title: Sadie Thompson
filmography.role_description: A 'fallen woman' seeking redemption on a tropical island who clashes with a fanatical moralist.
filmography.plot: A woman with a past arrives in Pago Pago and conflicts with a self-righteous reformer who tries to save her soul.

filmography.title: Queen Kelly
filmography.role_description: A convent girl who is seduced by a prince and sent to East Africa, where she becomes the madam of a brothel.
filmography.plot: A prince kidnaps a convent girl, leading to her exile in East Africa where she inherits a brothel.

filmography.title: The Trespasser
filmography.role_description: A stenographer who marries a wealthy man against his father's wishes and struggles to raise their child alone; Swanson's first talkie.
filmography.plot: A woman marries a rich man, is annulled by his father, and becomes a kept woman to support her son.

filmography.title: What a Widow!
filmography.role_description: A wealthy widow who is pursued by several men while traveling through Europe.
filmography.plot: A young widow navigates the social scene and various suitors in Paris and New York.

filmography.title: Indiscreet
filmography.role_description: A woman who falls in love with an author but tries to hide her past indiscretions from him.
filmography.plot: A woman tries to keep her past relationship a secret from her new love, leading to comedic complications.

filmography.title: Music in the Air
filmography.role_description: A temperamental opera diva whose jealousy causes romantic chaos in a Bavarian village.
filmography.plot: A diva and her librettist lover quarrel, leading them to interfere in the lives of a naive schoolteacher and his girlfriend.

filmography.title: Father Takes a Wife
filmography.role_description: A famous stage actress who marries a shipping magnate, leading to clashes with his family.
filmography.plot: A shipping tycoon marries a famous actress, much to the dismay of his son and daughter-in-law.

filmography.title: Sunset Boulevard
filmography.role_description: A faded silent film star living in delusions of grandeur who ensnares a struggling screenwriter in her fantasy world.
filmography.plot: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress (Drama)

filmography.title: Airport 1975
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as herself, dictating memoirs on a doomed flight; Swanson's final film role.
filmography.plot: A 747 is struck by a small plane, leaving the flight crew dead or incapacitated, and a stewardess must fly the plane.
